title: killing pablo - Pop Songs For Assholes
description:
killing pablo - Pop Songs For Assholes

Track Listing

   1. Brontosaurus Lisp
   2. aHoFF
   3. New Grenada
   4. Moes Theme
   5. How To Get On Fire
   6. Old Crow 

Worcester, MA\&#039;s own Killing Pablo bring their first official release, this 6 song e.p., to 75orLess Records... just over 30 minutes of feedback laden anarchistic art rock. Recorded with George Dussault at Galilee Studios, Pop Songs For Assholes mixes together a myriad of influences (Dinosaur Jr, Mogwai, Lightning Bolt, the MC5, Glenn Branca and everything inbetween) to create a style that is both a contemplative reverb-drenched drone and ear-bleeding sonic terrorism.


www.myspace.com/killingpablo
